subject: Brake travel setup help
description_text: Hi, I received my simsonn plus x pedal this week. I was wondering if there's a way to make the pedal travel longer. Currently the brake pedal travel about half an inch when pressed. I was something that matches regular road cars. I have not changed anything, so still setup the way it came from Simsonn. Any help is appreciated. Thanks,Anil

conversations.body_text: Hi anilabr21,  You can manually adjust the blue limiter on the pedal to increase the pedal travel. The detailed instructions can be found in the user manual.
